text: pretty much everyone pretends they've got everything under control but honestly most just excel at faking until making it...or never do 🤷‍♀️ growing up's overrated imo
all those 'milestones' can end up as just shiny distractions from figuring out our own stuff anyway - life ain’t a checklist!
had a client once spend hundreds on an app just for organizing their fridge...talk about foodie obsession lol
design world’s just as bad - creative women often overlooked
design world’s not safe—I roll eyes daily at biases too
design world's subtle but yeah...same issues
creative industries ain’t immune either... bias everywhere
overrated - cooking experiments trump plants any day
sustainability’s cool but ever consider hobby burnout? sometimes balance > deep dives.
sometimes singles dive into social media debates instead
settled into dealing with nosy questions; life’s good solo
society needs chill with their timelines tbh
always been into visual stuff cuz vibrant roots i guess
